short_description: b and r repair inc. is an auto service based in lemont, illinois, united states.
long_description: b & r repair inc. offers complete service of all makes and models of tractors, tankers, trucks, and trailers. over 32 trained certified technicians to serve you. two service locations, our main facility in lemont, illinois and our second location in westville, indiana. we provide complete fleet maintenance programs. emergency vehicle and apparatus repair and service. complete hydraulic repairs and maintenance. d.o.t. and hm testing facility. call or stop by and allow service manager to assist you with all of your transportation and fleet needs. call us today for all your service needs. we have three service locations; wampum pennsylvania, lansing illinois and our main facility in lemont illinois. b & r repair, inc. employs 32 certified technicians to serve your automotive, transportation and fabrication needs. b & r repair, inc. was established in 1987 as a father and son truck and tank repair shop. we have grown through the years while still maintaining an attitude of "no job too big, no job too small, we do them all!" this continued pride in our work ethic and business mentality has propelled us into the 21st century and the ever-changing transportation world.
